Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.08.2014 SH SCR19077 Part 3 Added test ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = N to perform part 3
15.05.2013 SH SCR18138 Part 2 Added test on ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y to perform the module
09.04.2013 SH SCR18075 Changed use of PI.LIMITTYPE from "C or 3" to "2,3,4,5"
21.06.2012 SH SCR17393 Extended PI.LIMITTYPE = C handling (part 1) with PI.LIMITTYPE = 3
20.11.2011 GB SCR16913 Added PO.MAXUSERLIMIT = 999999999 if ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y and AUTH_PERCENTAGE = 999
18.11.2011 GB SCR16913 Changed name of teh program from BDC128NL to BDC128
08.11.2011 SH SCR16858 Part2 Added test on ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y to set
PO.ALLOWEDLIMIT = 999999999 / PO.PERCENTAGE = 999
12.07.2011 SH SCR16578 Part3: Changed update PO.ALLOWEDLIMIT first approval
19.04.2011 GB SCR Replaced the GSET_YESNO by the GSBU_YESNO
22.03.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
GB002 by GB902
28.12.2010 GB SCR16098 Changed selection for First approval and Second approval
in the Part 2
17.06.2010 GB SCR15594 Changed condition when Calculation of allowed limit ...
is call (Part 2)
12.11.2009 SH SCR15050 Part1 Credit limits: Removed GSET(111) handling
04.08.2009 GB SCR14760 Extended list of parameters if GB418 is call
17.03.2008 SH SCR13462 Added PO.MAXUSERLIMIT and new part 3 and changed
part 1
-- Reset output parameters
-- Tests to leave module
... no limit type 2,3,4,5,F
... user = user first approval
-- Start testing limit competence
-- AUTH_TYPE = 12 if ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = N
-- AUTH_TYPE = 13 if ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y
-- for Part 2
-- Part 1: Credit limits
-- Part 2: Finance limits via percentages
-- Part 3: Finance limits via amounts
-- First approval
-- Second approval
-- Fetch AUTH row with highest AUTH_AMOUNTADVANCE (see SORT)
-- Prepare roles to fetch AUTH_AMOUNTADVANCE from AUTH
-- Calculation of allowed limit first and second approval
-- Fetch AUTH row with highest AUTH_PERCENTAGE (see SORT)
-- Prepare roles to fetch AUTH_PERCENTAGE from AUTH
Calculation of allowed limit first and second approval

SQL_STMT_U.val: select STCY_CURRENCY, cast(sum(STCY_TOTADEBTNOTESMENTIONED - STCY_TOTACREDNOTESMENTIONED) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/STCY join :1/SCHT on STCY_SCHT_NO = SCHT_NO and SCHT_ADMNO = :2 and SCHT_CLNTNO = :3 and (SCHT_BOOKED = 'B' or SCHT_BOOKED = 'N') group by STCY_CURRENCY order by STCY_CURRENCY for fetch only

Text.val: -- First approval
-- Second approval
-- Fetch AUTH row with highest AUTH_AMOUNTADVANCE (see SORT)
-- Prepare roles to fetch AUTH_AMOUNTADVANCE from AUTH
